sen.e: Kame no mae (year of birth and death unknown) was a woman, who lived during the late Heian Period.

sen.j: 亀の前は、頼朝が伊豆国へ出向いた際に見初められて、柔和な性格で気に入られ、密かに寵愛されるようになったと云われる。
sen.e: It is said that Yoritomo fell in lave with Kame no mae at first sight, when he went over to Izu Province, and as attracted by her gentle nature, he came to love her in secret.

sen.j: 正妻の北条政子が長男（源頼家）を妊娠中の1182年（寿永元年）6月、頼朝は亀の前を小坪 (逗子市)（逗子市）の小忠太光家の宅に召して寵愛した。
sen.e: In July 1182 (表記の変更), while his lawful wife, Masako HOJO was pregnant with his first son (MINAMOTO no Yoriie), Yoritomo invited Kame no mae to Mitsuie KOCHUTA's residence in Kotsubo (present Zushi City, Kanagawa Prefecture) and loved her.

sen.j: その後、頼朝は亀の前を飯島（逗子市）の伏見広綱の宅へ移して寵愛を続けた。
sen.e: Afterwards, he transferred Kame no mae to Hirotsuna FUSHIMI's residence in Iijima (Zushi City) and continued the meeting with strong attachment to her.
Afterwards, he transferred Kame no mae to Hirotsuna FUSHIMI's residence in Iijima (Zushi City) and continued the meeting with her.

sen.j: このことを政子は継母の牧の方から知らされ、嫉妬で激怒する。
sen.e: Masako, who was informed of Yoritomo's affaire from her stepmother, Maki no kata, got outraged by jealousy.

sen.j: 11月10日、政子は牧の方の父の牧宗親に命じて広綱の家を襲わせ打ち壊させた。
sen.e: On December 14, 1182 (表記の変更),Masako ordered Maki no kata's father, Munechika MAKI, to attack and destroy Hirotsuna's residence.

sen.j: 亀の前は広綱に連れられ、鐙摺（葉山町）の大多和義久の宅へ逃れた。
sen.e: Kame no mae was escorted by Hirotsuna and escaped to Yoshihisa OTAWA's residence in Abuzuri (Hayama-machi).
Kame no mae was escorted by Hirotsuna and escaped to Yoshihisa OTAWA's residence in Abuzuri (Hayama-machi).

sen.j: 怒った頼朝は鐙摺に出向き、牧宗親を呼び出して叱責し、髻を切って辱めた。
sen.e: Irate Yoritomo hastened to Abuzuri, and summoned Munechika MAKI to reprehend him and cut his hair to affront him.
The irate Yoritomo hastened to Abuzuri, and summoned Munechika MAKI to reprehend him and cut his hair to affront him.

sen.j: これを知った政子の父北条時政が一族を率いて伊豆国へ立ち退いてしまう事件に発展した。
sen.e: When Masako's father, Tokimasa HOJO came to know that, this skirmish developed into an incident, in which Tokimasa abandoned Izu Province leading all his family.
When Masako's father, Tokimasa HOJO came to know that, this skirmish developed into an incident, in which Tokimasa withdrew to Izu Province leading all his family.

sen.j: 12月10日、亀の前は小坪の小忠太光家の宅へ移された。
sen.e: On January 12, 1183 (表記の変更), Kame no mae was transferred to Mitsuie KOCHUTA's residence in Kotsubo.

sen.j: 亀の前は政子の嫉妬をひどく恐れたが、頼朝の寵愛は深まった。
sen.e: Kame no mae was very afraid of Masako's jealousy, but Yoritomo's affection was even more strengthened.

sen.j: 12月16日、政子の怒りが収まらず、伏見広綱は遠江国へ流罪となってしまった。
